name: Samsung Galaxy A54

display.additional:
Dynamic Island
Always-On display
HDR display
True Tone
Wide color (P3)

description: Enhanced capabilities thanks lean A16 Bionic chip. A huge leap in battery life. Innovative safety features with crash detection. All in a dependable design.
long_description: Just as a book is judged by its cover, the first thing you notice when you pick up a modern smartphone is the display. Nothing surprising, because advanced technologies allow you to practically level the display frames and cutouts for the front camera and speaker, leaving no room for bold design solutions.
